dmca.title: Copyright violations by your customer
dmca.body:
nc


-----Original Message-----
From: Andrew -- GTS Team [mailto:info@gayteenstudio.com] 
Sent: Saturday, February 12, 2005 4:15 AM
To: Lance Crosby
Subject: Copyright violations by your customer


Dear sir!

One of your customers/subscribers is keeping picture-post board.
Members of this board do post photography from different adult web sites.
The do cut identification logos and URLs from photoes and then post them
on this board. This is Copyright violation.

We, Telion Ventures Limited, operator of www.gayteenstudio.com web site 
request that you take required actions against your subscriber. We tried to 
communicate with your subscriber, but they not only ignored our e-mails, but

added our addresses to many SPAM databases (so called FFA opt-in lists).

Please tell us which documents you will need from us to resolve this case.
We, of course, by req. of s.2257 USC have all documents for our models,
like passport copies, model releases, contracts, etc.

Also let me notify you that about 2% of posts on this board are Child 
Pornograpy. I will be reporting this to FBI separately.

Link to one of our photographic sets on your subscriber's site:
http://www.dirtylovers.net/forum/index.php?act=ST&f=5&t=4532&s=edab3d9985036
e352682fd14631e3464


Andrew Mamaladze
Managing Director.
-- 
GayTeenStudio Team
Telion Ventures Limited, 2 Portland House, Glacius Road City, Gibraltar.

"Excellence is never an accident: it is the result of high intention, 
sincere effort, intelligent direction, skillful execution and the vision 
to see obstacles as opportunities."
